00017 #pragma once
00018 
00019 //  This is the only thrust header that is guarenteed to 
00020 //  change with every thrust release.
00021 //
00022 //  THRUST_VERSION % 100 is the sub-minor version
00023 //  THRUST_VERSION / 100 % 1000 is the minor version
00024 //  THRUST_VERSION / 100000 is the major version
00025 
00026 #define THRUST_VERSION 100000
00027
